item.description:
Next Chai Tech Wednesdays Meetup:

Wednesday November 18, 2009, 6:30-8:30 p.m.
Location: Lir Irish Pub, 903 Boylston St, Boston

Please RSVP and tell your friends about our monthly networking event for entrepreneurs and anyone in the High Tech industry in greater Boston's Jewish community. The format of this event is networking and helping you meet your business goals.

------------

Chai Tech Wednesdays is a free monthly networking event sponsored by CJP's Technology Industry Group. CJP is Boston's Jewish Federation, which works to care for people in need, to preserve Jewish learning and to enrich Jewish culture worldwide. To learn more, contact Larry Tobin at larryt@cjp.org or visit www.cjp.org.
item.name: Chai Tech Wednesdays
